mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MERCENARY_VIEW WHERE mercenary_time_start_at < TO_DATE(#{time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND mercenary_time_end_at > TO_DATE(#{time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

SELECT * FROM MERCENARY_VIEW WHERE 1=1
AND REGION_NAME LIKE #{region_name} || '%'
AND CITY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{city_name} || '%'
AND mercenary_time_start_at <= TO_DATE(#{time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND mercenary_time_end_at >= TO_DATE(#{time}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
SELECT * FROM MATCH_SCHEDULE_VIEW WHERE (HOME_TEAM_ID =#{team_id} OR AWAY_TEAM_ID =#{team_id}) AND MATCH_STATUS = '예정됨'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MERCENARY_OFFER( MERCENARY_OFFER_ID, MERCENARY_OFFER_AT, FIELD_RES_ID, MERCENARY_ID, TEAM_ID ) VALUES ( MERCENARY_OFFER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, sysdate, #{field_res_id}, #{mercenary_id}, #{team_id} )
mapper.select: INSERT INTO MERCENARY_RESPONSE ( MERCENARY_RESPONSE_ID, MERCENARY_RESPONSE_AT, MERCENARY_OFFER_ID, RESPONSE_TYPE_ID )VALUES ( MERCENARY_RESPONSE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{mercenary_offer_id},#{response_type_id} )
